payouts.title: Payouts & payments
payouts.notConnectedSubtitle: Set up your Stripe banking information
payouts.connectedDescription: Your earnings are automatically transferred to your bank account after each session is validated.
payouts.singlePayment: Single sessions: immediate payment after the session
payouts.packPayment: Packs: payment after the first session of the pack
payouts.notConnectedDescription: Complete the connection to receive your future payments.
payouts.connectedHint: Payouts are processed automatically immediately after session validation.
payouts.notConnectedHint: Payouts are processed automatically within 7 business days after session validation.

benefits.title: What you get with the free trial:
benefits.fullAccess: 30 days of full access to all coach features
benefits.agendaManagement: Complete management of your agenda and availability
benefits.stripeIntegration: Stripe integration to receive your payments

activate.note: The promo code can only be used once per account. After 30 days, you can switch to a paid subscription to continue coaching.
